channel.title: How do i make a npc attack rite
channel.description: Ok this is a nub question how do you make a npc attack rite instead of them like folding inhalf...lol and i know there is a number to add so im trying to make it for a dragon if someone can help me be apreaciated ;D

item.title: How do i make a npc attack rite
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

search for boolean attackplayer in npchandler.java.

You will see stuff like this

						} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 41) {
							npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x037; //chicken attack

follow that format for each npc you want…

npcs[NPCID].npcType is the ID of the NPC

npcs[NPCID].animNumber is the ID of the attack animation

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc attack rite

item.title: How do i make a npc attack rite

well you go into the file that handles npc and you set the attack style like by creating a list of of
info on that one npc like attack style and other things but the thing is i dont know the attack styles and how to create the npc configuration for npc styles so im just as puzzled as you?
